mapper.select: select key matchrule autoreply where user=#{user}
select type,content from autoreply where user=#{0} and key=#{1}
mapper.delete: delete from autoreply where user=#{0} and key=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into autoreply(user, key, matchrule, type, content) values(#{user}, #{key}, #{matchrule}, #{type}, #{content})
mapper.update: update autoreply set type=#{type} content=#{content} where user=#{user} key=#{key}
